articles.author: Marianne LeVine, Shayna Jacobs
articles.title: Two federal courts extend deportation block under Alien Enemies Act - The Washington Post
articles.description: One judge accused the Trump administration of drastic and un-American tactics in its removal of migrants. “This is not the Inquisition,” he said.
articles.content: Two federal courts on Tuesday temporarily restrained the Trump administration from deporting individuals in their districts under the Alien Enemies Act, with one judge comparing the governments depor… [+3811 chars]
